title: What Is Scalp Psoriasis?
description: Symptoms may include fine scaling that looks like dandruff, or appear as thick, crusted plaques that cover the entire scalp. Scalp psoriasis can affect the scalp, hairline, forehead, back of the neck and skin around the ears. OTC products may help manage symptoms if you have mild scalp psoriasis.
